          <title>
            <string language="hu">Trónoló Krisztus, VI. század közepe, Ravenna, San Vitale, Mozaik</string>
            <string language="en">Jesus Christ Enthroned, in the middle of the seventh century, Ravenna, Savn Vitale, mosaic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Jesus Christ inthronisierte, mitten in dem 7. 
Jahrhundert, Ravenna, Savn Vitale, Mosaik</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jésus le Christ a couronné, au milieu du 
septième siècle, Ravenne, Savn Vitale, mosaïque</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Jesus Christ enthroned, no meio do sétimo 
século, Ravenna, Savn Vitale, mosaic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Jesus Christ enthroned, nel mezzo del settimo 
secolo, Ravenna, Savn Vitale, mosaico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιησούς Χριστός Enthroned, στο μέσο του έβδομου 
αιώνα, Ραβένα, Savn Vitale, μωσαϊκό</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Jesús Cristo enthroned, en el centro del séptimo
siglo, Ravena, Savn Vitale, mosaico</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">San Vitale mozaikja a Trónoló Krisztussal</string>
            <string language="en">San Vitale's mosaic about the enthroned Jesus Christ</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Németország,  barokk,  freskó,  </string>
            <string language="en">Germany,  Würzburg, baroque,  fresco</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">San Vitales Mosaik über den inthronisierten Jesus
Christ</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mosaïque de San Vitale au sujet de Jésus 
couronné le Christ</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mosaic do San Vitale sobre o Jesus enthroned 
Christ</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mosaico di San Vitale circa il Jesus enthroned 
Christ</string>

          <description>

          <description>

          <keyword>
